metadata.title: Industrix - Diesel Operations Digitalization
metadata.description: Real-time diesel monitoring and fuel tracking for heavy equipment operations. IoT sensors, theft detection, and cloud dashboards for plantations, construction, mining, and forestry.

hero.title: Digitalize Your
hero.description: Real-time fuel monitoring, theft prevention, and complete operational visibility for heavy equipment. From IoT sensors to cloud dashboards, proven in Indonesian plantations.

about.title: Diesel Operations
about.description: We digitalize diesel footprints for heavy equipment operations, proven in Indonesian palm oil plantations with a roadmap for global application.

iotPump.title: IoT Fuel Pump System
iotPump.description: Mini fuel station kits with pumps, flow meters, tank probes, and RFID tap access for complete fuel management

accessControl.title: User Access Control
accessControl.description: RFID-based access control with role permissions, multi-factor authentication, and operator activity tracking

monitoring.title: Real-time Monitoring
monitoring.description: Cloud dashboards showing live fuel levels, consumption rates, historical trends, and efficiency reports

theft.title: Theft Detection
theft.description: Automated alerts for suspicious fuel drops, unauthorized access attempts, and operational anomalies

platform.title: One Platform,
platform.description: If you run excavators, trucks, or generators — we can help.

worksAnywhere.title: Works Anywhere

fullStack.title: Full Stack Delivery

howItWorks.title: How
howItWorks.description: From consultation to operation — we handle everything. You just focus on your core business.

consultation.title: Consultation & Survey
consultation.description: Our team visits your site to understand operational needs, number of heavy equipment units, and available infrastructure.

installation.title: Hardware Installation
installation.description: We install IoT sensors, flow meters, and RFID systems on your fuel tanks and pumps. Installation takes 1-3 days per location.

cloud.title: Cloud Connection
cloud.description: All sensors connect to our cloud platform. Data is transmitted in real-time via cellular network or WiFi.

dashboard.title: Dashboard Access
dashboard.description: Your team gets access to web dashboard and mobile app for monitoring fuel levels, consumption, and daily reports.

support.title: Ongoing Support
support.description: Monthly subscription includes maintenance, software updates, and technical support to ensure optimal system performance.

serviceModel.label: Service Model:
